Sammy Métref will join us in Datlas next week (Aug. 1st). Welcome to him! Read More ›

2022-07-22 › Starting a collaboration with Semaphore
We have just started a collaboration with the Semaphore team, to help us find a nice logo and visual identity for Datlas. Read More ›

2022-07-07 › SLICING: a new Service Evolution CMEMS project.
Sammy and Clément have organised the kickoff meeting of SLICING (CMEMS Service Evolution) on Jul 7th, 2022. Read More ›

2022-07-01 › Welcome to Joseph, PhD student
Datlas is now in a partnership with the MIO and LIS research institues and University of Toulon, France to host Joseph Jenkins's PhD (CIFRE grant) on surface ocean currents and the prediction of Lagrangian drift by deep learning. Read More ›

2022-06-25 › The 2022 annual meeting took place in Grenoble
Stephanie and Laurent have participated in the annual meeting of project SASIP, taking place in Grenoble, 20-23 June 2022. Read More ›

2022-05-09 › Datlas has a website!
datlas as a website! We are still working on the content of the site at the moment, so sorry for any page that would not be finised yet! Feel free to contact us if you need any information. Read More ›

2022-04-01 › Welcome to Stephanie
Stephanie Leroux has joined datlas and will start developping activities on ocean and sea ice modelling and ensemble simulations. Read More ›

About
